message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $80. How about we compromise at $180?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $150?
